arts.ttl: Haaland fires Man City second with Bournemouth win
arts.sum: Erling Haaland scored twice to help move Manchester City up to second in the Premier League with a 3-1 victory over Bournemouth.

arts.ttl: Man City vs Bournemouth: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 10, 2025
arts.sum: After firing a blank last weekend away at Villa Park, he will be keen to continue his 100% scoring record at the Etihad Stadium . He has only failed to find the back of the net two times this campaign: a 2-1 loss to Brighton at the Amex Stadium in August and a 1-0 defeat against Aston Villa at Villa Park .

arts.ttl: "The club of his heart" - Foden poised to break Man City record in Bournemouth game
arts.sum: Manchester City playmaker Phil Foden will set a new Citizens club record if he makes an appearance in Sunday's Premier League showdown with Bournemouth at the Etihad Stadium.

arts.ttl: 'Monster' Antoine Semenyo tipped to rival Erling Haaland ahead of Man City clash
arts.sum: Bournemouth midfielder Alex Scott reckons that 'the whole world' is witnessing the pace and power of team-mate Antoine Semenyo ahead of their clash with Manchester City on Sunday

arts.ttl: Manchester City vs. Bournemouth: City to edge past tricky Cherries
arts.sum: Manchester City entertain high-flying Bournemouth on Sunday afternoon, after securing a place in the quarter-finals of the EFL Cup in midweek and it should be an entertaining contest.
